text:
I dowloaded the latest FOP (Fop-0.20.2RC-bin.tar.gz) and tried to run the 
examples in /docs/examples. The runtests.bat referred to ..\..\lib\ant.jar, which 
was missing. I downloaded the full Ant and copied ant.jar to the lib directory. 
After that the examples ran fine.
creator: petri.riihikallio@metis.fi
j3322ptm@yahoo.de

batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
